Giant Rat Skull

Description

It could be a nice hunting trophy, but it smells too bad to place it on a wall. On the other hand, it demonstrates that owner is capable of killing rats, even big and smelly ones. This skull has special properties related to rat control.

Stats

  • Type: Quest Item / Artifact
  • Rarity: Quest Item
  • Price: 100 gold
  • Identified: Always

Special Properties

  • Rat Intimidation: When equipped, the acrid stench terrifies all other rodents around, making them flee from the skull bearer
  • Quest Item: Originally part of the Ghost quest in the sewers
  • Alternative Quest Reward: Used as the alternative reward for the Ghost quest (instead of Dried Rose)

Acquisition

  • Dropped by Fetid Rat (a special rat variant)
  • Alternative reward from the Ghost quest in the sewers
  • Part of the sewers questline for players who chose the rat skull quest path

Buff Effect

When equipped, provides the “Ratter” buff which:

  • Causes all rodent-type enemies to flee in fear
  • Applies to all Rat-type creatures in the dungeon
  • Has the description: “The acrid stench terrifies all other rodents around, making them flee from the skull bearer.”
  • When a rat-type enemy detects the player with this item equipped, it enters a Fleeing AI state and is affected by Terror debuff

Notes

The Giant Rat Skull is a quest item that's part of the Ghost's questline. It represents an alternative path in the sewers quest where the player hunts a special Fetid Rat instead of collecting 8 regular rat corpses. When equipped, it provides a useful effect against rat-type enemies.

Related Pages

  • Ghost - NPC that starts the quest
  • Fetid Rat - Special rat variant that drops the skull
  • Rat - Basic mob affected by the skull
  • Fleeing - AI state that affected mobs enter
  • Terror - Debuff applied to affected mobs

Source Code References

  • Java: RatSkull.java
  • String resources: String definitions
  • Buff implementation: BuffFactory.java
  • Rat interaction: Rat.java
